a, b, c = map(int, input().split())
print(min(b // a, c))

a, b, c = map(int, input().split())
print(min(b // a, c))

A,B,C = map(int, input().split())

count = 0
while B >= A and count < C:
    B -= A
    count += 1
print(count)


a,b,c = map(int,input().split())
print(min(b//a,c)) 

A,B,C = map(int, input().split())

if B < A:
    print(0)
else:
    count = 0
    while B >= A and count < C:
        B -= A
        count += 1
    print(count)
